title: Repairing Furniture
brief_description: Learn how to choose between white, yellow and hot hide glue, how to dissemble a piece safely and clean surfaces for glueing, how to clamp problem pieces, how to reglue or replace damaged veneer and how to mend broken parts and match missing mouldings.
